description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The Paris 6-hour Outboard Race - the yearly international outboard-motor race on the Seine. The new Renaults - the TS15 and TS17. Altiport testing. 2. An export industry - the Graffenstaden Gear-Plant. 3. Fashions - Courreges and Chanel ready-to-wear. 4. The arts: The autumn Salon - the yearly exhibition at the Grand Palais. Masson in Amiens - Andre Masson retrospective.
